'''''lin''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word that was the meaning "pool, mere".<ref>{{S|Appendix}}, ''lin'' (1)</ref>
==Etymology==
[[Root]] [[LINI]]
==Examples==
* ''[[ailin|ai'''lin''']]'' = "lake"
* ''[[Linaewen|'''Lin'''aewen]]'' = "Lake of Birds"
* ''[[Taeglin|Taeg'''lin''']]'' = "boundary pool"?<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, LIN (1)</ref>
